医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
饥饿神经元周围的细胞污泥与糖尿病和肥胖症恶化有关研究下丘脑的 ECM 变化揭示了胰岛素抵抗背后的机制，为肥胖和代谢疾病的治疗提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Cellular-sludge-around-hunger-neurons-linked-to-worsening-diabetes-and-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Cellular-sludge-around-hunger-neurons-linked-to-worsening-diabetes-and-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb226662-c959-4eda-bc12-a819c18cbff0 Thu, 19 Sep 2024 13:52:00 -0400 Cellular sludge around hunger neurons linked to worsening diabetes and obesity
研究人员在加强青少年双相情感障碍的早期诊断方面取得了进展在爱思唯尔发表的《生物精神病学》上的一项开创性研究中，研究人员报告说，在加强青少年双相情感障碍的早期诊断方面取得了重大进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Researchers-make-strides-in-enhancing-early-diagnosis-of-bipolar-disorder-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Researchers-make-strides-in-enhancing-early-diagnosis-of-bipolar-disorder-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eeb89e02-0541-416f-b9ba-26470ff1338c Thu, 19 Sep 2024 13:36:00 -0400 Researchers make strides in enhancing early diagnosis of bipolar disorder in adolescents
研究揭示母乳对婴儿微生物组和呼吸系统健康的影响在婴儿出生的第一年，母乳可以调节婴儿的微生物组合或微生物组。一项新的研究表明，这反过来又降低了孩子患哮喘的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Study-reveals-impact-of- human-breast-milk-on-infant-microbiome-and-respiratory-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Study-reveals-impact-of- human-breast-milk-on-infant-microbiome-and-respiratory-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7678d06-15c8-429f-8c61-fbb36e285d1d Thu, 19 Sep 2024 13:31:05 -0400 Study reveals impact of human breast milk on infant microbiome and respiratory health
脂质体布比卡因在老年人术后疼痛管理方面没有优势《骨与关节外科杂志》上的一项研究报告称，对于因髋部骨折而接受半髋关节置换术的老年人，与传统布比卡因相比，术中使用脂质体布比卡因并不能改善疼痛评分或其他相关结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Liposomal-bupivacaine-shows-no-advantage-in-postoperative-pain-management-for-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Liposomal-bupivacaine-shows-no-advantage-in-postoperative-pain-management-for-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c69e571-dbd9-4b89-90f1-a136c2b95a90 Thu, 19 Sep 2024 13:25:37 -0400 Liposomal bupivacaine shows no advantage in postoperative pain management for older adults
新的活检技术降低了前列腺癌检测中的感染风险由威尔康奈尔医学院和纽约长老会研究人员领导的一项多机构临床试验表明，与传统活检方法相比，收集前列腺活检样本的新技术可降低感染风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/New-biopsy-technique-reduces-infection-risk-in-prostate-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/New-biopsy-technique-reduces-infection-risk-in-prostate-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c15f6751-20cd-4a8d-895e-63332eddcfbd Thu, 19 Sep 2024 13:17:12 -0400 New biopsy technique reduces infection risk in prostate cancer detection
一期试验显示淋巴浆细胞淋巴瘤个体化疫苗的安全性和有效性来自美国最大、最先进的癌症研究和治疗组织之一 City of Hope® 和德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的研究人员团队报告了一项 1 期试验的安全性和有效性结果，该试验的特点是根据《自然通讯》最近发表的一项研究，治疗淋巴浆细胞淋巴瘤的个性化疫苗是一种罕见且生长缓慢的血癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Phase-1-trial-shows-safety-and-efficacy-of-personalized-vaccine-for-lymphoplasmacytic-lymphoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Phase-1-trial-shows-safety-and-efficacy-of-personalized-vaccine-for-lymphoplasmacytic-lymphoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a390d777-30d9-46ad-9be2-9489d8947135 Thu, 19 Sep 2024 13:11:59 -0400 Phase 1 trial shows safety and efficacy of personalized vaccine for lymphoplasmacytic lymphoma
使用折纸传感器识别废水中生物标志物的新方法克兰菲尔德大学的研究人员开发了一种创新的新方法，使用折纸传感器识别废水中的生物标记物，从而可以使用手机中的摄像头跟踪传染病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/New-method-identizes-biomarkers-in-wastewater-using-origami-paper-sensors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/New-method-identizes-biomarkers-in-wastewater-using-origami-paper-sensors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc2e578c-782b-4fe9-9497-a1795ab95d19 Thu, 19 Sep 2024 13:04:31 -0400 New method identifies biomarkers in wastewater using origami-paper sensors
新模型揭示机械通气肺损伤机制科学家第一次能够直接比较机械通气对肺部细胞造成的不同类型的损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/New-model-reveals-mechanisms-of-lung-injury-from-mechanical-ventilation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/New-model-reveals-mechanisms-of-lung-injury-from-mechanical-ventilation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d269666e-ab66-4ab2-b7d3-f3dfb4bbbe39 Thu, 19 Sep 2024 12:59:47 -0400 New model reveals mechanisms of lung injury from mechanical ventilation
FIND Lp(a) 机器学习模型旨在改变心血管疾病筛查今天，领先的研究和倡导组织 Family Heart Foundation® 宣布成功完成 Flag、Identify、Network and Deliver™“FIND Lp(a)”机器学习模型，这是同类产品中的首个在美国各地的护理服务系统中实施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/FIND-Lp(a)-machine-learning-model-aims-to-transform-cardioangio-disease-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/FIND-Lp(a)-machine-learning-model-aims-to-transform-cardioangio-disease-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e2b8fce-98fa-4df9-9aa4-63922e4b20ad Thu, 19 Sep 2024 12:48:57 -0400 FIND Lp(a) machine learning model aims to transform cardiovascular disease screening
研究人员寻求利用人工智能彻底改变直肠癌治疗凯斯西储大学和路易斯斯托克斯克利夫兰退伍军人医疗中心的研究人员获得美国退伍军人事务部新的四年期 114 万美元拨款，将利用人工智能 (AI) 为患有直肠癌的退伍军人确定最佳个性化治疗方案癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Researchers-seek-to-revolutionize-ectal-cancer-treatment-with-AI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Researchers-seek-to-revolutionize-rectal-cancer-treatment-with-AI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b4b7867-4c8a-4fb5-9dad-960bb1d05f89 Thu, 19 Sep 2024 12:43:29 -0400 Researchers seek to revolutionize rectal cancer treatment with AI
